mapper.select: select count(*) from wk_crm_customer where to_days(next_time) = to_days(now()) and last_time < next_time and owner_user_id = #{userId} and status != 3 and customer_id not in (select type_id from wk_crm_back_log_deal where model = 1 and crm_type = 2 and create_user_id = #{userId})

select count(*) from wk_crm_customer as a where is_receive = 1 and followup = 0 and status = 1 and owner_user_id = #{userId} and customer_id not in (select type_id from wk_crm_back_log_deal where model = 3 and crm_type = 2 and create_user_id = #{userId})

select count(*) from wk_crm_leads as a where followup = 0 and is_transform = 0 and owner_user_id = #{userId} and is_receive = 1 and leads_id not in (select type_id from wk_crm_back_log_deal where model = 2 and crm_type = 1 and create_user_id = #{userId})

select count(*) from wk_crm_receivables_plan as a inner join wk_crm_customer as b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id inner join wk_crm_contract as c on a.contract_id = c.contract_id left join wk_crm_receivables d on a.receivables_id = d.receivables_id where to_days(a.return_date) >= to_days(now()) and to_days(a.return_date) <= to_days(now())+a.remind and (a.receivables_id is null or d.check_status != 1) and c.owner_user_id = #{userId} and a.plan_id not in (select type_id from wk_crm_back_log_deal where model = 7 and crm_type = 8 and create_user_id = #{userId})

select a.plan_id,a.num,a.customer_id,a.contract_id,c.num as contractNum,a.money,a.return_date,a.return_type,a.remind,a.remark from wk_crm_receivables_plan as a inner join wk_crm_contract as c on a.contract_id = c.contract_id left join wk_crm_receivables d on a.receivables_id = d.receivables_id where 1=1
and to_days(a.return_date) >= to_days(now()) and to_days(a.return_date) <= to_days(now())+a.remind and (a.receivables_id is null or d.check_status != 1)
and a.receivables_id is not null and d.check_status = 1
and to_days(a.return_date) < to_days(now()) and (a.receivables_id is null or d.check_status != 1)
and plan_id='0'
and c.owner_user_id = #{userId} and a.plan_id not in
